name: A Friend Atop Snow Quail Mountain
name_original: A Friend Atop Snow Quail Mountain
description:
Stranded at the bottom of an icy peak with nothing but your wits and your trusty Grappler, you're on a mission to return to your friend at the top.

CONTROLS

L/R arrow keys   -------   Move left/right

U/D arrow keys   -------   Move up/down (while using Grappler)

Down arrow key   -------   Swap Grappler magnet/spike (while not using Grappler)

X   ----------------------   Use Grappler

Z   ----------------------   Jump

MADE IN 72 HOURS FOR THE LOST CARTRIDGE JAM 2022

--- MattStov (concept, art, programming) 

https://twitter.com/MattstovArt

--- Cardboard Moon (music, SFX)

https://twitter.com/cardboardmoon

This NES cartridge was lost in the ice for over 30 years! Most of it adheres to the original limitations of the system. Music and sound effects were produced with the free NES tracker, FamiStudio.

PLEASE:

--- Download the OST

--- Leave a comment about your experience

--- Accept our thanks for playing!
